pwa.installDescription: Install on your device to play anytime, anywhere!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: tri-FACTa!™ is a two-player card game based on mathematical operations that develops logical thinking through fun mathematical calculations. The game supports both addition/subtraction and multiplication/division modes.

basicRules.title: Basic Rules
basicRules.winCondition: Win Condition: First player to use all their cards wins
basicRules.initialCards: Initial Cards: Each player gets 6 cards

setup.title: 1. Setup Phase
setup.shuffle: • Place all cards face down on the table
setup.draw: • Each player draws 6 cards as their hand

turn.title: 2. Turn Phase
turn.replace: • Players can replace 2 or 3 cards each turn
turn.replaceExample: Example: Replace 2 cards (8 and wildcard) or 3 cards (10, 5, and 5)
turn.mathRelation: • Replaced cards must form a valid mathematical relationship
turn.priority: • If multiple players can play, the player with the highest number goes first

noPlay.title: 3. When Unable to Play
noPlay.draw: • Draw a new card to add to your hand
noPlay.continue: • If you can play after drawing, continue playing
noPlay.pass: • If still unable to play, pass to the next player

specialRules.title: Special Rules
specialRules.wildcardValue: • Wildcards can represent any number from 1 to 20
specialRules.wildcardDeclaration: • Must declare the value when using a wildcard
specialRules.wildcardPersistence: • Once a wildcard's value is determined, it remains the same for the entire game

interaction.title: Interaction Controls
interaction.dragAndDrop: • Long press and drag cards to the center triangle area
interaction.clickToSelect: • Click to select a position in the triangle
interaction.clickToDeselect: • Click a selected card to deselect it

game.title: tri-FACTa!™
game.subtitle: Improve your math skills through gaming

instructions.title: Game Instructions
instructions.basicDesc: Place 2-3 cards to form a valid mathematical relationship. The first player to use all their cards wins!
instructions.additionDesc: The sum of the top two numbers must equal the bottom number.
instructions.multiplicationDesc: The product of the top two numbers must equal the bottom number.
instructions.multiplayer: This is a two-player game where players take turns
instructions.winCondition: The first player to complete all cards wins
instructions.wildcard: Use wildcards to skip any card
instructions.interaction:
• Long press and drag cards to the center triangle area
• Click to select a position in the triangle
• Click a selected card to deselect it
